messages.content: New branches/complexes/districts/regions and revenue/expense accounts added to the BDW  must be reflected in the RFS system. 100% of the entities (mentioned above) available as of October month-end  will be loaded into the RFS system  prior to the budget start process.
NFR

The Disputes System must provide Search functionality.  The search method must include the ability to search by (1) the dispute case number  (2) the merchant account number  (3) the cardmember account number and (4) the issuer number.  In addition to the above criteria  the search functionality must further allow the user to limit the results of the search by a date range  the type of dispute (ticket retrieval request or chargeback notification)  the case status (open  closed or all) and the dispute reason code.
FR
The product shall allow a player to end a game at any time during the game.
FR
Fit Criterion: Dr Susan Poslusny and Karen Sysol are the only people who shall have access to the final class section scheduling for the system that interfaces with CampusConnect.
NFR

The system shall be responsive. At the DePaul TeleServices Center  when a supervisor uses the system to view a callers schedule  the system response time must be no more than 2 seconds 90% of the time and no more than 5 seconds the rest of the time.
NFR
Out of 1000 accesses to the system  the system is available 999 times.
NFR
The product shall comply with insurance regulations regarding claims processing.
NFR
Only authorized users shall have access to clinical site information.
NFR
The product shall allow a player to initiate a game by selecting another available player from the list of players.
FR
We must be able to interface with the following browsers: IE 5.X  6.0  Netscape 6.x  7.x  8.x and Firefox 1.0.
NFR
Each time a conference room is reserved  the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.
FR
Website must be fully operational with MSN TV2.
NFR
Only users with Update access must be able to initiate dispute requests.
NFR
Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.
FR
The product shall free of computer viruses.
NFR
The system shall be used by realtors with no training.
NFR
The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.
NFR
The product shall have security.The product shall provide authentication  and authorization.
NFR

The RFS system should be available 24/7  especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year  and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time  the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.
NFR
The system shall achieve 95% up time.
NFR
The system shall have a professional appearance
NFR
The system shall update or create new property listings in the MLS
FR
System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.
NFR
The response time shall be fast enough to maintain the flow of the game. The response time shall be no more than 2 seconds for 95% of responses and no more than 4% for the remaining responses.
NFR
The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.
FR

The product shall ensure that only company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs may have product access.  100% of all logons shall be by either company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs.
NFR
The product shall simulate the look of ships at sea.
NFR
Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members are the only people who shall have access to clinical site details.
NFR
The system shall display the Events in a graph by time.
FR
The audit report shall include the total score of the audit which sums the indivual line items.
FR
The system shall be able to display a printable summary of the system log.
FR
The system shall locate the preferred repair facility with the highest ratings for the input criteria
FR
The system shall search for available recycled parts for the supplied vehicle parts and suppliers.
FR
The ratings shall be from a scale of 1-10
FR
Only the System Administrator shall be able to reset a revoked user logon account
NFR
The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.
NFR
For each turn  the product shall identify one player as offensive status and one player as defensive status.
FR
The system shall allow modification of the display.
FR
System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday  and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.
FR
2 out of 3 Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall successfully be able to use the system to manage the scheduling of classes and clinicals.
NFR
The leads washing functionality will validate all leads received by the web service for valid data
FR
The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.
FR
The product�s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer�s organization such as logo  branding  and identity
NFR
A customer can only stream a movie if they purchased it  and are within the 2 day viewing period.
NFR

The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser.  The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).
NFR
The audit report shall include the total number of recycled parts used in the estimate.
FR
The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the realtor community.
NFR
The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.
NFR
Recreation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment for the period of previous 30 days shall take no more than 30min.
NFR

The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.  This will allow the Disputes application to request adjustments to cardmember and merchant�s accounts. All adjustment requests must be sent to the Cardmember Posting and Billing System.
NFR
The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.
NFR
Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.
FR
The product shall allow the player to position ships diagonally on their grid
FR
A user shall be able to use the system without instruction after a short amount of time. After one use a user should understand and remember 90% of the system usage and navigation.
NFR
The leads washing functionality will verify the users authentication and rights to make parameter updates.
FR
100% of saved user preferences shall be restored when system comes back online.
NFR
The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment
FR
Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)
NFR
The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.
NFR
The notification of the game ending will include the reason the game is ended (i.e.  a player has won the game or a player has ended the game).
FR
The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.
NFR

The Brio portion of the WCS system must be able to export files in spreadsheet form (Microsoft Excel and Lotus 1-2-3 formats).  Brio will provide buttons in the user interface that produce/export reports in .xls or .123 file formats.
NFR
The Disputes System shall prevent the creation of duplicate dispute requests 100% of the time.
FR
The interface must summarize the data in a fashion that�s appealing to CCR management. Every report type must have at least one high level summary shown in the results dashboard/interface
NFR
Izogn Administrator must be able to update the category listings on the website within 2 minutes.
NFR
The product shall produce search results in an acceptable time
NFR
The website shall be attractive to all audiences.  The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.
NFR
Washing parameters will be updated during scheduled maintenance hours.
NFR

The product must work with most database management systems (DBMS) on the market  whether the DBMS is colocated with the product on the same machine or is located on a different machine on the computer network.
NFR
The recycled parts search results provided to the estimator shall be retrieved by the system.
FR
The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization�s information policy.
NFR
The vehicle location shall include street address  city  state  and zipcode
FR
The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers
FR
The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.
FR
All customer information will be stored on a secure database  accessible only to authorized personnel.
NFR
All streaming movie sales will be logged in the database  and accessible by the administrator.
FR
The system shall use IBM and CCR branding standards. The interface must have one IBM logo and one CCR logo.
NFR
The product is expected to integrate with multiple database management systems.  The product will operate with Oracle  SQL Server  DB2  MySQL  HSQL  and MS Access.
NFR
The product shall have a conservative and professional appearance.
NFR
The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.
FR
98% of the user workstations shall meet the minimum hardware requirements prior to implementation. Minimum Hard Disk Space:  400MB.
NFR
A clinical class shall specify the course name  lecture room requirements  clinical site needs  lecture instructor needs  and clinical lab instructor needs.
FR

The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the  Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies.  Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.
NFR
Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to add a student who has registered for a clinical class to a clinical lab section for that class.
FR
The product shall store new conference rooms.
FR
The search for the preferred repair facility shall take no longer than 8 seconds.  The preferred repair facility is returned within 8 seconds
NFR
The System shall allow entering  storing and modifying product formulas.
FR
Aside from server failure  the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.
NFR
The vehicle data shall include vehicle year  make  and model
FR
Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds  unless noted by an exception below.
NFR

Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to modify information relating to a Program of Study within the Nursing Department  including the Program of study name  and required classes for that Program of Study.
FR
The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks
FR
The system shall reveal private information only in compliance with the organization�s information policy.
NFR
The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.
FR
The product shall allow the user to select a chosen language from one of the target market countries.
NFR
The system shall be able to display a report of needed classes for a given quarter for all cohorts of all programs for Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members� planning purposes.
FR
The Disputes System must provide different levels of access with regard to disputes case initiation and follow-up actions.
FR
The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.
FR

The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product�s lifecycle.  Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.
NFR

The Disputes System shall accurately provide a list of possible reason codes for a given transaction.  The list of possible reason codes must be derived based on the type of transaction and the industry that the merchant belongs to  according to the business rules defined for the Disputes System.
FR
The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System.  This provides the feed of recycled parts data.
NFR
The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.
NFR
The product shall be available for use 24 hours per day  365 days  per year
NFR
The product shall maintain the status of each player for a turn  either offensive or defensive.
FR
The system shall refresh the display every 60 seconds.
NFR
The product shall able to handle a large number of games simultaneously.
NFR

Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system  every year  prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt  after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations  to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.
NFR
The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.
NFR

The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests.  This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2.  The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.
NFR
The product must be designed using Design Patterns and coding best practices.  90% of maintenance software developers are able to integrate new functionality into the product with 2 working days.
NFR
The product shall be available for distribution via the Internet as a binary or ZIP file.
NFR
Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall have the ability to specify which classes are required for a Program of Study
FR
The Disputes application shall be available 24x7x365  with the exception of the following scheduled maintenance windows.  Monday � Saturday 3:00am to 4:00am EST Sunday 1:00amd to 5:00am EST
NFR
For each shot  the product shall examine the defensive grid of the defensive player to determine whether the shot was a hit or miss.
FR
The system shall retain the available recycled parts and suppliers returned from the search.
FR
Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.
NFR
The website should appeal to all Africans  not only Nigerians.
NFR
100% of the cardmember and merchant services representatives shall use the Disputes application regularly after a 2-day training course.
NFR
The product shall comply with corporate color scheme
NFR
For each class within a sequence for a cohort  Program Administrators and Nursing Staff Members shall be able to specify which quarter that class will be offered.
FR
The website should cater to all tribes in Nigeria.
NFR
The product is expected to run on Windows CE and Palm operating systems.
NFR
The WCS system shall not allow automatic logins by any user. Cookies containing WCS login information about a user will not be stored on a user�s computer.
NFR
The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.
NFR
The preferred repair facility shall be returned to the user.
FR
